QuestData.Title: Out of Place
QuestData.Description: The gorge is an unforgiving place. We don't get a whole lot of fuzzy wildlife wandering around here.$b$bWe tried bringing in some wild game, but they haven't fared well at all. There's just no food for them to eat. Now the nearby spiders - which were already dangerous - are getting big and fat on chicken meat.$b$bWe'll never get rid of all the spiders, but we can salvage what few chickens remain. Not only will you be feeding the Brotherhood, you'll be saving them a painful death by spider bite.
QuestData.RewardText: You've got quick hands if you were able to gather this many in such a short time.$b$bExcellent work, $n. I'll make sure these ones don't go to waste.
